issue.title: indy100.com (N: uBlock Origin) (T: Ads)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO 1.43.0 + IDCAC 3.4.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.indy100.com/science-tech/return-to-monkey-island-ron-gilbert

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, ---Third-party filters---, EasyList Lithuania, I don't care about cookies, Adblock List for Finland, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Various placeholders in the article. I propose `indy100.com##div[id^=content_]`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/178169287-b096db73-9eb6-434f-bb78-6761d1f5c4b0.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Scam domain report
issue.body:
Здравствуйте!

Домен [https://dumpishop.ru/](https://dumpishop.ru/?ref=10767) является мошенническим и предназначен для выманивания платёжных данных.

К примеру по следующей ссылке:
https://dumpishop.ru/category/keys

Для вашего удобства создал аккаунт:
Логин/пароль: Scamrrrrrr/1234567

Продаются СКАМ ключи к псевдо валютам (скрин 1). После выбора ранодомного «товара» (http://dumpishop.ru/eshop_show/46) предлагается пополнить баланс (скрин 2). После получения ошибки, переходим во вкладку «пополнения баланса» (скрин 3). И выбираем рандомную платёжную систему (скрин 4). После нажатия на кнопку пополнить, мошеннический сайт просит ввести сумму в рублях (скрин 5). Пусть будет 900. После нажатия на кнопку оплаты, попадаем на мошенническую страницу с просьбой перевести деньги на мобильный номер (скрин 6) и текстом «По просьбам наших пользователей, мы отключили стандартный мерчант QIWI и установили способ пополнения "Прямым переводом".»

Скриншоты:

https://i.ibb.co/GtGZGsj/67-F3-A3-AB-DDFF-46-B2-82-E9-024-EB68-C9-EE7.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/ssbSPTz/AB0-C12-E7-EB8-D-49-FE-9-B9-D-D856-BACE7-E82.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/5cqQ95s/CF613593-897-E-4-A85-85-AC-CC67-BA0-FC1-C2.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/3rrpzWK/07-EAA358-4-ACA-49-FD-942-A-7-F0-A61129745.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/CnwZrnF/56-BB80-CE-75-D2-4332-A225-10-EFD0-E4-B115.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/QDt06vc/97658-FC9-BB4-C-4-F4-C-9-B72-F2166-A9-B50-F6.jpg

Прошу принять меры и заблокировать указанный ресурс.
